title: # 339 - Michael Rosenbaum & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Michael Rosenbaum to talk about his role as Lex Luthor on Smallville, making it in Hollywood, failures, working on Guardians of the Galaxy 2 with Sylvester Stallone, and I ask the greatest question I've ever asked on my podcast!

Listen to Michaels podcast "Inside of you with Michael Rosenbaum"

This episode is brought to you by Robinhood. Buy and sell stocks with the Robinhood app. Right now Robinhood is giving listeners a free stock like Apple, Ford, or Sprint to help build your portfolio. Go to www.Bertcast.robinhood.com and sign up today.

This episode is also brought to you by Four Sigmatic. Get 15% off of your order using the promo code “Bertcast” or by going to www.foursigmatic.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Capterra. Visit www.capterra.com/bert to find the right tool for your business 

This episode is also brought to you by Quip. Get your first refill pack for free when you order a Quip electric toothbrush at www.getquip.com/bert 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
